pr_title: Issue 4902: (SLTS) - Implement more efficient eviction cache for ReadIndexCache

timeline.message:
Issue 5067: (SLTS) - Implement more efficient eviction cache for ReadIndexCache.

Signed-off-by: Sachin Joshi <sachin.joshi@emc.com>

timeline.bodyText: Guava cache is synchronized. Why are you re-synchronizing?
timeline.author: andreipaduroiu

replies.bodyText:
Multiple threads might find that entry does not exist and might race to create the entry for the first time. (This code is invoked only once per segment). If that happens then only one instance wins and other thread is holding on to a dangling reference that will be garbage collected - thus basically loosing updates.
I did not find clean putIfNotPresent equivalent method.
replies.author: sachin-j-joshi

replies.bodyText: SimpleCache has putIfAbsent. Check it out
replies.author: andreipaduroiu
